# `useMultipleFilesUpload()`

Use the hook `useFileUpload` to upload multiple files.

```tsx
const {
  upload,
  add,
  clear,
  progress,
  isUploaded,
  isUploading,
  list,
  hasError,
  cancel
} = useMultipleFilesUpload()

const addFile = async (file: File) => {
  add(file)
}

const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
  e.preventDefault()
  upload()
}
```
